Posts.Content: I'm sending you a hug too! Breast cancer is tough enough; but when the people we love and had counted on to be there for us aren't, it really hurts. Don't apologize, we all have our days. Sometimes I want to just punch a clown or tear up a million phonebooks in frustration. Hang in there, you have support here and you can count on that! LadyDi1
Posts.Title: Pity Party

Posts.Content: I am so sorry for your loss. I wish I could be there to help you. If you find yourself alone in a red room know that is you being held in the hearts of every woman on this site. We cannot stop someone from killing themselves, they are in a dark place nothing can reach. Please surround yourself with friends and loved ones now and talk to someone on the support line. Hugs and Prayers, ladydi1
Posts.Title: plz help
